scripts.copy:monaco-editor-wrapper: npm run copy:libs:prepare && npx shx cp -fr ./node_modules/monaco-editor-wrapper/bundle ./static/libs/monaco-editor-wrapper
scripts.copy:monaco-workers: npm run copy:libs:prepare && npx shx cp -f ../node_modules/monaco-editor-workers/dist/index.* ./static/libs/monaco-editor-workers && npx shx cp -f ../node_modules/monaco-editor-workers/dist/workers/editorWorker-iife.js ./static/libs/monaco-editor-workers/workers
scripts.build:static: npm run clean:static && npm run build:worker/statemachine && npm run build:worker/playground-common && npm run build:worker/playground-langium && npm run build:worker/playground-user && npm run copy:monaco-editor-wrapper && npm run copy:monaco-workers
scripts.build: npm run build:static && cross-env NODE_ENV=production  hugo        --config ./config.toml    -b /              -d ../public --gc --minify
scripts.watch: npm run build:static && cross-env NODE_ENV=development hugo server --config ./config.toml -D -b localhost:1313 -d ../public --appendPort=false
scripts.watch:gitpod: npm run build:static && cross-env NODE_ENV=development hugo server --config ./config.toml -D -b `gp url 1313` -d ../public --appendPort=false
